verses.roman:
ei tina madhye yabe thāke yei jana
tāṅre āsi' āpane mile,--prabhura niyama

synonyms: ei tina madhye—of these three; yabe—when; thāke—remains; yei jana—that person who; tāṅre—to him; āsi'-coming; āpane mile—personally meets; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; niyama—regular practice.
translation: If one of these three was not present, He would meet the others. That was His regular practice.
